PATIENT_ID: TEST_PELVIC_002
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-02-20 14:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-02-20 14:10:00
Category III activation for 66-year-old female. Low-energy fall.
Isolated right wrist injury. No hip or trunk complaints.
BP 140/86, HR 68, RR 14, GCS 15.
Hemodynamically stable. Ambulating in ED.

[IMAGING] 2026-02-20 14:30:00
Right wrist x-ray: distal radius fracture.
No abdominal or trunk imaging obtained.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-02-20 14:50:00
Isolated wrist fracture. Splinted. Discharged with follow-up.
